title: Mahou no Tenshi Creamy Mami: Long Goodbye
original_name: 魔法の天使クリィミーマミ　ロング・グッドバイ
opening_song: "Heart no season (ハートの season)" by Takako Oota (太田貴子)
ending_song: "Girls Talk (ガールズ・トーク)" by Takako Oota (太田貴子)
sinopse: Shingo is planning the film "A Story of Two Worlds" starring Megumi. Yuu's transformation into Creamy Mami is happening without her wanting it. She is asked to star in the film too. But the magic doesn't last...
